title: The Genie from down under: where it's at
creator_credit: Australian Children's Television Foundation, ABC-TV (Australia), British Broadcasting Corporation, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones and Esben Storm
brief_description: Bruce wants to become human but to do this he must take the opal to the cave where it was mined over a hundred years before. He sets out to trick Penelope into visiting the cave.
